# The White Room
Primary language: de
Region: D-A-CH
Purpose: High-end clarity interventions and essays on responsibility, decision-making, language and silence.

Key pages:
- /index.html : Mission / positioning
- /angebot.html : Service, pricing, booking
- /angebot.html#faq : FAQ
- /raum-fuer-business.html : CV / credentials
- /raum-fuer-kunst.html : Poems (evidence of depth)
- /blog.html : Essays

Brand name: The White Room
Domain: https://enterwhiteroom.com
